title: fslswapdim
description: Swap dimensions of an image volume

axis_a.title: X-axis dimension
axis_a.description: New x-axis dimension (e.g., -x, x, RL, etc.)

axis_b.title: Y-axis dimension
axis_b.description: New y-axis dimension (e.g., -y, y, PA, etc.)

axis_c.title: Z-axis dimension
axis_c.description: New z-axis dimension (e.g., -z, z, IS, etc.)

output_file.title: Output file
output_file.description: Output image (e.g., output.nii.gz). If not specified, the equivalent transformation matrix is written to the standard output.
